https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/y40IcwQOTOsvU32TDIEG2KA1g9V.jpg Shadowed by a strict, military father who inflicts severe methods of punishment as a form of discipline, seventeen year old Ariella commits a grave error that her father isn't willing to punish her for. Seeking a punishment of her own, Ariella embarks on a dark quest where she will discover a secret to her father's past that will lead them to confront one another. Broken Mirrors
